overview: Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology (NIET) is a self-financed institute offering high-quality education to students from all parts of the country.
The institute is located in Greater Noida, a prominent hub of global multinational companies, providing strong industry exposure to students.
NIET has a sprawling campus spread over 23 acres with a lush green and well-maintained ambience.
The institute is committed to delivering academic excellence while fostering innovation, practical learning, and overall student development.
rankings: The Institute is accredited by NAAC with A Grade (CGPA 3.23) and by NBA for programs including CSE, ECE, ME, Biotechnology, B.Pharm, MBA, MCA, and PGDM.
NIET Pharmacy Institute is ranked 37th in the NIRF rankings, and Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology (NIET), Greater Noida, falls in the 101–150 rank band in the NIRF Engineering category.
The institute aims at recognizing, respecting, and nurturing the creative potential of every student, fostering academic excellence and holistic development.
awards: Several programs at NIET are accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA).
NIET has received awards for academic excellence and industry–institute collaboration.
The institute is accredited by NAAC with Grade A.
international_alliances: NIET offers international exposure through academic collaborations and twinning programs with foreign universities.

overview: NIET promotes research activities among faculty members and students across engineering, technology, and management disciplines.
The institute encourages innovation, publications, patents, and participation in funded research projects.
publications: Research papers published by faculty and students in national and international journals and conferences.
journals: NIET supports publication in peer-reviewed national and international journals.
